attributes.action:
We are tired of you exploiting this apparent crisis.
End tyrannical lockdowns.
attributes.additional_details:
We have endured a long hard year (so far) of unfair and pretty much tyrannical exploitation of this virus in which you have taken away freedoms which is not your right and bully tactics from media and police to enforce your control agenda.

We will not enter into any more lockdowns weather you try to enforce them or not.
We are letting you know that after April we will not take part in your control agenda any more, we will continue with our work and lives regardless of your decisions.
attributes.background:
This is not a threat or to incite any violence.
You have caused more issues for the people of this country than the virus to the point now where you the government are the threat to the people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
